DOS.desc: DOS (two in Spanish) is a single-player puzzle game where the objective is to strategically roll the die to get the two face on top! Use the various tiles that make up each level which can move or rotate the die to achieve the goal.

Breakthrough.desc: Breakthrough is an arcade game where the player must use boom blocks to blow up other tiles. The goal is to get a piece under player's control all the way to the bottom of the game board, 'breaking through' the level. The game is endless and each level gets progressively harder to clear.

Prichi.desc: Prichi is an infinite 'dungeon crawler'-esque game where you play as a queen chess piece and try to eliminate all opposing black chess pieces. Each level is randomly generated and goal is to get as far as possible without blundering your queen!

Collab.desc: Collab is a 2-player puzzle platforming game where you need to work together to solve various puzzles. Each player can switch between four unique character abilities to aid their navigation through each level. Have each player reach the goal to beat each level!

Blockchain.desc: Blockchain is a puzzle game that revolves around chaining various blocks together. Each block has different properties that allow them to either stick to other blocks or slide past them. You must create different shapes in order to avoid falling into the abyss below. Navigate your way to the white button in each level to win!

gcmdesigns.desc: A portfolio website made for Gabriela Colon-Melendez, an Industrial Design major at Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. It displays some of her school projects that she has finished, complete with images, design documents, CAD renderings, and sketches.

Wumpus.desc: Wumpus is a dungeon crawler where you are tasked with killing the guardian of the dungeon, the Wumpus. Use various weapons and tools to locate the Wumpus while avoiding hazards and slay the beast!
